title: Principia Metaphysica v23.0: A Sterile G2-Manifold Framework with 0.48σ Cosmological Alignment
description: This release presents the v23.0 STERILE model: all 125 fundamental physical constants emerge as spectral residues of the compact G2 manifold (TCS #187) under Ricci flow—without free parameters, tuning, or calibration. The framework achieves 0.48σ global alignment with Planck 2018, DESI 2025, and NuFIT 6.0 experimental data. Includes a complete 42-certificate audit ledger with Wolfram verification, dark energy w₀ = -23/24 matching DESI 2025 thawing (0.02σ), and Hubble constant H₀ = 73.04 km/s/Mpc matching SH0ES 2025 (0.0σ).
notes: 42-certificate validation ledger included. All parameters derived from TCS G2 topology. Auth-free, open-access release suitable for offline verification.
